s2.name: JORAM community
s2.p: The JORAM community is reachable through the joram@ow2.org forum.
For joining this community, you may subscribe.
For getting in touch with the JORAM development team only, send a mail to the joram-team@ow2.org address (this address is not meant to get support requests).

s2.name: JOnAS community
s2.p: The JOnAS community includes skilled people using JORAM/JMS within the JOnAS application server. It is reachable through the jonas@ow2.org forum.
